faq.q1: How do I activate my eSIM?
faq.a1: After purchase, you'll receive a QR code via email. Simply scan it with your phone's camera, and your eSIM will be activated instantly. Make sure your device supports eSIM functionality.
faq.q2: Can I use the SIM card immediately upon arrival?
faq.a2: Yes! Physical SIM cards can be picked up at our stores in Myeongdong or Hongdae, and activated immediately. eSIMs can be activated before you even land in Korea.
faq.q3: What happens if I run out of data?
faq.a3: Don't worry! You can top up your data plan anytime through our website or by visiting one of our stores. We also offer unlimited data plans for heavy users.

privacyPolicy.section1Content: 82Mobile is committed to protecting your privacy and personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your data when you use our services.

privacyPolicy.section2Item2: Payment Information: Credit card details (processed securely through our payment gateway)
privacyPolicy.section2Item3: Device Information: Device type, operating system, and browser information
privacyPolicy.section2Item4: Usage Data: Pages visited, time spent on site, and interaction patterns
privacyPolicy.section3Item1: Process orders and deliver SIM cards
privacyPolicy.section3Item2: Provide customer support and respond to inquiries
privacyPolicy.section3Item3: Send order confirmations and service updates
privacyPolicy.section4Content: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy, unless a longer retention period is required by law. After this period, we securely delete or anonymize your data.
privacyPolicy.section5Item1: Access: Request a copy of your personal data
privacyPolicy.section5Item2: Correction: Update or correct inaccurate information

privacyPolicy.section6Content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. All payment transactions are encrypted using SSL technology.
privacyPolicy.section7Content: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or how we handle your personal information, please contact us:

refundPolicy.metaDescription: Learn about 82Mobile's refund and cancellation policy.
refundPolicy.title: Refund Policy
refundPolicy.section1Content: At 82Mobile, we want you to be completely satisfied with your purchase. This Refund Policy outlines the conditions under which refunds are available.
refundPolicy.section2Intro: Refunds are available under the following circumstances:
refundPolicy.section2Eligible1: SIM card not activated: Full refund if the SIM card has not been activated
refundPolicy.section2Eligible2: Service malfunction: Refund or replacement if the service fails due to technical issues on our end
refundPolicy.section2Eligible3: Order cancellation: Full refund if you cancel before the SIM card is shipped
refundPolicy.section2NotEligible1: Already activated: No refund once the SIM card has been activated
refundPolicy.section2NotEligible2: Used data: No refund for data plans that have been partially or fully used
refundPolicy.section2NotEligible3: Past 7 days: Refund requests must be made within 7 days of purchase (for unactivated cards)
refundPolicy.section3Step1: Contact our customer support via email or phone
refundPolicy.section3Step2: Provide your order number and reason for refund
refundPolicy.section3Step3: Return the SIM card (if applicable) in original, unused condition
refundPolicy.section3Step4: Refund will be processed to your original payment method
refundPolicy.section4Content: Refunds are typically processed within 5-7 business days after approval. Please allow an additional 3-5 business days for the refund to appear in your account, depending on your bank or payment provider.
refundPolicy.section5Content: In certain circumstances, partial refunds may be granted at our discretion, such as for service disruptions or quality issues that do not warrant a full refund.
